Reviews.Title: Has some good features and some less than good!
Reviews.Author: HWWoman "HWWoman"
Reviews.Content: I have used this phone for many months now.  First off let me say that I don't talk on the phone while driving.  This cell phone would probably be less than ideal for that.  However, if you want to talk and drive without holding the phone, you can actually put it on the seat next to you and use the speaker phone feature with the phone case open.The outside of this cell phone is not pretty. It is very blah - the numbers are in shades of gray.  Inside the phone, however, you have a very cute and functional keypad with mirrored sides.  The key pad is ideal for texting and the speaker phone works very well in my experience.  Also you can listen to music if you want, but there is no regular headphone jack so you have to purchase an adapter.  This phone takes a micro SD card.Video quality and features are not good.  You can only take clips of 30 seconds or less.Supposedly the camera has a zoom feature, but I haven't found it yet. Maybe I should call the company about this.That said, the camera is perfectly adequate for capturing still shots when you don't have your camera on hand.  I have used it to take many photos (hundreds) and overall I am very impressed.  The camera is apparently a Samsung 2 MP.  It is great for photos for Facebook and takes up very little space on your computer hard drive.  If you want to take photos of people, you will need to ask them to stand still.I have the $10 AT&T; unlimited internet plan with this free phone.  It is basically only good for looking up phone numbers on websites.  I have also used it to go to Youtube, but it is a very basic internet plan and I really can't recommend it other than for occasional use.  It is often unresponsive and slow.I am holding out for now before I splurge on a new phone. Truth be told, I may turn this phone into a camera at some point in the future.  This phone is mechanically sound with no problems whatsover.  The keypad is immaculate because it's housed inside the camera.  I protect the exterior with clear plastic film.  I purchased a pink rhinestone bling case that's as good as new after months of use and extremely durable.I really love some of the photos that I have taken - sort of fuzzy and artsy if taken in low lighting, but crystal clear in outdoor lighting.Update November 23, 2012:Well, I have purchased a replacement phone, but I am sad to let this one go. I loved the camera. It had a unique feature of actually lightening up some photos.  I have a feeling that I may be disappointed in my new cellphone camera (even though it is 8 MP vs. this 2 MP camera).  I took a few pictures with my new cellphone (Samsung Galaxy SIII)with interior lighting, but some of them were blurry, especially with some motion.  I didn't see this happening except with motion with the Pantech phone. I have taken almost 3,000 photos with this camera and most of them were more than acceptable and some were spectacular.  My cellphone is still in mint condition except for some minor scratches on the front.

Reviews.Title: Half baked piece of $#%^^!
Reviews.Author: S. Korenblit
Reviews.Content: This phone is unusable. The mic quality is terrible - people tell me the background noise comes in clearer than my voice.Also, the browser is slow as hell. Is this really 3G?To top it off, the keyboard locks when you have a call and you cannot hang up. I am never buying another phone from this company - ever.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone, horrible customer service from Pantech
Reviews.Author: A and S
Reviews.Content: I do NOT recommend you purchase this phone.  Everything has pros and cons so here are the pros.  My daughter got this in pink, and it's pretty.  It has a flip open design with a qwerty keyboard.The cons?  Ease of operation isn't the best.  It take multiple steps to perform many functions which doesn't make sense.  The phone is not durable.  The back cover does not stay on.  Google it and you will see it is a known common problem.  I emailed Pantech when this phone was a few months old, after buying a skin for my daughter, and realizing I needed to get a new cover so the skin could be applied.  They said they would mail out a new back cover.  This was in May and it is now September.  I've been going back and forth with Pantech and they have given me lame excuses like it will be mailed out next week, it will be mailed out in 4 weeks, we are forwarding your email to a supervisor.  None of which got us the cover.  She was talking on the phone the other day, and I actually saw the back cover fall off, she dropped the phone because of it and the camera lens cracked.  I emailed Pantech (AGAIN) telling them what happened now because of the back cover not staying on and their response to me was that the camera lens cracking is not covered under warranty because my daughter dropped the phone, and that the back cover will be sent out within a week.Please do yourself a favor and do not get this phone.  We are going back to AT&T; in hopes they will do something for us because Pantech is not.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone with good features
Reviews.Author: diva
Reviews.Content: This is my second pantech.............I'm not into the new Iphones etc but this particular phone I've been using for quite some time.  I like the keyboard as my nails are longer and its easy to text....navigation is good and good sound quality when on a call.  Its a tough little phone too as I'm dropping it constantly.Actually this is a back up phone as my original phone is ready to be buried.One thing is the back panel does tend to drop off when the phone ages.  I just add a piece of tape to keep it on but Im talking 3 years before I had to do this.

Reviews.Title: Great price!!!
Reviews.Author: Michel Dubovoy
Reviews.Content: Great phone liked the it is new with a PERFECT price, so glad it is unlocked and so nice. Thank you!!

Reviews.Title: Pink P7000 Pantech cell phone
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Lacey
Reviews.Content: Excellent transaction,very pleased! Delivery was prompt, price was right, phone was in better shape than described - our grand daughter is happy to have a phone exactly like the one she lost! It was exactly what we were looking for !!!  It even had songs on it that she really likes !  Thank You

Reviews.Title: Pantech just makes great phones...
Reviews.Author: S. Kironde
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I didn't give up, I thought I would never find a phone that I could easily text with; on Blackberry like keypads I kept hitting two keys and on the glass touch keypads I could not get used to the feel except for very short messages. I needed real keys if was going to reply to my friends text messages.  I got this phone and I love it.  Also, everything is very logically placed... even things like notepad and video folders and camera functions.  Thank you (-:

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Cheetahs rock!
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing!!! I would recommend this phone for kids. It a great buy and not a waste of money!

Reviews.Title: Happy at last
Reviews.Author: Teresa G. Spain
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome I had one before and needed a new one it has all I need. Good looking too.

Reviews.Title: replacement
Reviews.Author: Army wife ch47
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone before and liked it alot. But when my phone got dropped I set out to buy same phone. Couldn't find it in stores anymore. I am very pleased that I found it online. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Good points & not so good points
Reviews.Author: JMF
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a good non-smart phone.  Since I don't have cell service around where I live, this phone is for going to town, texting there and taking photos where I like.  This is a different style phone than I had, (slide open phone), so it takes getting used to.  I like the texting keyboard and the quality/loudness of the speakerphone.  The viewing port for the photos is definitely poorly placed as it is on the very right hand edge of phone where finger tends to be in order to aim.  Also am used to having a different ringtone for each of my contacts and that's not available on this phone(it was nice knowing who's calling by ear!)  The touch screen on the front is nice although it's a bit touchy at times. With Bluetooth in car,  I dial one of my speed dials and set phone down and it will disconnect from the slight bump.  Overall I like this phone the quality is good and what I expected.  The size is good and works well.  I was thankful to find a phone with the features I need still on the market and not forced to purchase a data pkg. that I have no use for.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Love Simple Easy Phone!
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Highly would recommend this phone to anyone who just wants to text & talk on phone.  Just a simple, easy & cute phone to have.  Had a phone like this one but broke so I had to order this one.  Now I have a second chance to take better care of my phone that I really love.  Just a simple, easy & lovable phone to have.

Reviews.Title: reliable phone, insufficient battery
Reviews.Author: Timothy McFadden
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace the same phone which had worked well for 3 1/2 years.  Just need a basic phone for talk and text and did not want to extend contract.  The new one works as well as expected, but the battery  does not hold charge as well as the one in my 3 1/2 yr old phone.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever.
Reviews.Author: Average Libertarian
Reviews.Content: I have had this excellent phone for 3 years, and it is only now starting to show signs of wear. Great keyboard, and amazing picture quality. I accidentaly dropped it in snow  one time, and the phone literally healed itself, and worked great a day later. can handle any abuse you can possibly throw at it. Pantech has made a thouroughly tank of a phone with the Impact p7000.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: rachel mccartt
Reviews.Content: works great but I wish it had better range at work in some areas. Other then that I like it.

Reviews.Title: Keys already sticking
Reviews.Author: BARBARA COATES
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this a month and the keys are already sticking.I would like to exchange it for another one.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Vargas
Reviews.Content: I JUST LOVE MY PANTECHP7000....I KEEP ORDERING THEM OVER AND OVER AGAIN IN CASE ONE GETS LOST OR DAMAGED.....THE BEST PHONE I HAVE EVER OWNED....I GOT THE PINK AND THE BLUE AND GOING BACK TO THE PINK BECAUSE ITS SO MUCH EASIER TO SEE WITH THE WHITE KEYBOARD.....JUST LOVE IT...EVEN THO I LOVE THE BLUE ONE TOO THE COLOR IS SO PRETTY AND SHINY, ITS JUST SO HARD FOR ME TO SEE THE KEYS AT MY AGE, I NEED SOMETHING EASIER TO SEE...SO THANK YOU AND I'M SURE I WILL BE MAKING ANOTHER PURCHASE SOON.....I LIKE THAT THE PRICES ARE LOWER THAT MAKES IT EASIER TO PURCHASE ANOTHER ONE....LOVE IT! SANDRA VARGAS....

Reviews.Title: Good, but..
Reviews.Author: Leila Baqi
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT, GREAT QUALITY!! GREAT PHONE!! BUT, the only problem is the back.. it won't snap on.. i got it today and i was trying to put it together but it wont come on so..

Reviews.Title: Well...It IS a replacement.
Reviews.Author: Chelsey
Reviews.Content: The product is alright. The phone can be extremely slow but it does it's job. The battery life is great and it takes a very short time period to charge which is great. I've had few problems with this phone but it's speed makes the phone just "okay."

Reviews.Title: Pantech ... more like Panthetic
Reviews.Author: B. Colonna
Reviews.Content: I have owned several different Pantech phones on my family plan.  Almost all run into various issues, all needed to be exchanged when under warranty, and once out of warranty, Pantech support is minimal at best.  Read the other reviews.  This model is no exception.  It is riddled with design defects that Pantech ignores.....battery covers that won't stay on, phones that shut off by themselves.Only one Pantech model has performed well, the Pursuit/Pursuit II.  Every other, most notably the Impact and the Link - AWFUL.I won't even go into the features, as this is just a bad phone and you should avoid it.We maintain our phones and keep them protected, not mistreated - this are just junk.  And if you call Pantech, even willing to buy replacement parts, like battery doors, they tend to have no spare parts, probably because they get used up replacing all the defects.

Reviews.Title: My teenage daughter had this phone for years!
Reviews.Author: KarenH
Reviews.Content: My teenage daughter had this phone (but in blue) for at least 2 years.  It got a bit beat up and she bought a new phone.  She went back to the Pantech Impact.  The back covers aren't great is the only bad thing.  My daughter saw the pink Pantech and purchased that.  My daughter-in-law saw it and used it and loved it, so I bought her one here.  She absolutely loves it!

Reviews.Title: parent
Reviews.Author: Parent
Reviews.Content: Phone was inoperable after 2 months.  The hinge to the keyboard is very weak,  if it breaks the phone will NOT work. AT&T; would NOT cover this in their warranty!

Reviews.Title: Never again will I buy a Pantech phone!
Reviews.Author: Maureen Laube
Reviews.Content: I will NEVER buy another Pantech phone. The back cover to my phone will not to on properly. My husband has the exact same phone & somehow (not from dropping) it will no longer charge the battery.  Pantech won't cover because it is an internal part.  Excuse me?  What are warranties for anyway?  This phone was never abused in any way.  Now, I must put his battery in my phone each time to recharge until our 2 year contract is up - which unfortunately is another whole year!

Reviews.Title: not great BUT....
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: this phone has givin me alot of trouble over the past 2 years, drops calls, turns off randomly, i lose the Z button, and it freezes. but one thing made it all worth while, this phone NEVER breaks. i'm not kidding, its been washed, dropped in a pool, dropped on concrete atleast 1000 times, and yet it still works. to be honest i'm stunned. and it was free on AT&T;'s website. its been a good phone for 2 years, now i get my iPhone 4s to replace this piece of s***.

Reviews.Title: It's Great!....at first
Reviews.Author: S. Harrod
Reviews.Content: When I first got this phone, it was great! It was, and still is very easy to text with. It's a good first phone but there are some cons. The screen scratches very easily, after dropping it several times (my fault) the camera cracked, although it doesnt show up in pictures. The camera is alright for a first phone. Now it has been around 20 months I've had the phone and recently a messsage appears saying "INSERT SIM CARD" causing me to have to take out the battery and sim card and reinsert them (pain in the but!) Also, a glitch has been occuring and whenever I turn on my phone (and persay I have 115 messages in my inbox) and it will say "115 new messages" making me delete all messages. Also, the back cover came off twice and I was not able to put it back on, I ordered a new one which came within a week, but the same thing happened. The second time I ordered a new one, it never came. I would reccomend this phone as long as you are very careful with it.

Reviews.Title: Good for texting
Reviews.Author: Linnzy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone from eBay in June, and I'm pretty satisfied with it. I love the QWERTY, and I am pleased with the speaker. I am not pleased with the lack of a 3.5 mm headphone jack though. To use a headset, you must purchase a $10 adapter, or you can buy headphone/adapter sets. I understand it's an older phone though, so I can accept it. Also, the charger is kind of obsolete, so don't look for a universal that will fit it.  In action, the phone works well. I have had no problems with calls or texts, and the layouts are pleasing. It's not difficult to adjust settings to my taste. So far, I have noticed one design flaw, and that is the numeric touchpad on the front of the phone. Sometimes, the keys become unresponsive, especially the END key. I have to press it multiple times to activate it, and there have been several occasions in which it does not work at all and I am forced to open the phone and manually end the conversation. This is not a deal-breaker for me, but it is a hassle when I'm in a hurry.  All in all, I enjoy using this phone, and for the price I paid for it I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: christina21799
Reviews.Content: (pink pantech pone) ok well i got the phone and it worked for like a day and then it stooped working and it keeps saying insert sim when my sim card is in and im pretty sure it came water damaged to because you tore the sticker off so i couldn't see it was pink so the phone does not work thank you very much! bye.

Reviews.Title: RIPPED OFF!!
Reviews.Author: JoJo
Reviews.Content: The phone that was sent had previous water damage and one of the charging prongs was broken.  I never thought someone would send a damaged phone.  This experience left me wondering if I will order online again.  So, my review is awful.

Reviews.Title: Cute, that's all!
Reviews.Author: RMLTBr
Reviews.Content: I got this phone new and it arrived defective, the front screen was locked and I couldn't find the way to unlocked it, neither the customer support from the place I bought it. The internal keyboard is almost illegible and the key's backlights were not working entirely.Besides, I thought it could be a nice phone for my daughter and it is definitely not child friendly.

Reviews.Title: not happy at all
Reviews.Author: brenda
Reviews.Content: i purchased a pantech phone.....sure the device was used but i was suppose to be in very good condition....this item was purchased on 6-30-2011....todday is august 3, 2011 and i am yet able to use the phone...the phone is not able to come on and there was an adapter sent but it was almost new but did not go with the cell phone....this is a company that i will not use again...i would have know that the device and adapter were going to be in such poor condition i would never have ordered a cookie from this company....this is one person that will not order anything from again....signed ms very unhappy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pantech Impact P7000 (Unlocked Quadband)
User Manual
Travel Charger, Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Impact P7000 (At&t) Phone, Pink. Unlocked
